post.body: Zen Cupcake started following me too.
Peapod's Christmas play
Nothing ultimately devestating. Mostly unnerving.
At Nan's Comics on city business. Rly!
Finished a ... monster toy? Two gifts to go
Periodic table of Awesome: http://www.eatliver.com/i.php?n=3723 Hillgiant, note 43
Answer: I know some Neanderthal skulls, but they are in use.
Question: I found a petrified cave man skull. Can you tell me if it's worth anything?
Now I know what to do for the cookie exchange! http://tinyurl.com/5668y5
I have voice mail, but I can't remember the password I just changed. FAIL
10 days until Christmas. Immediate family done. 2.5 prezzies still to knit. Thank heavens they're small!
Had to rethink week. Thought I was free and clear, but schedule quickly filled with activity.
Weather took a 20 degree dip in a couple hours as will happen in TX
Peapod enjoying playground and toy dump truck
Bad traffic led to a Mission Burrito detour.
Still must learn Spanish
Such a strange interaction but not too far off our path and the right thing to do.
Somehow I found myself giving her a ride to her church despite me trying to explain we weqe going somewhere different and I couldn't pic ...
Well that was interesting! Peapod and I were getting in the car to go to church when our neighbor saw us. She doesn't speak English.
OMG we have neighbors we trees synched to a soundtrack!
The woman who ran the party noticed how musical our Peapod is and strongly encouraged us to sign her up for rhythm band
Gah! Pajama Pete attack! http://tinyurl.com/ax7br9
"I have to take their **** but I can't take their cookies" http://tinyurl.com/9bo2tl
Whoa, people! No need to stand so close!
At work this morning fighting the post holiday blues. And wearing sandals.
Duck, asperagus, green cauliflower, 4 cheese ravioli
Made it to and through mass
HTWIAM seems to like handmade hat, ice cream ball and Asimov books
Wish I had caught Peapod's face when she opened the Count-eyes went wide and ah ah aaah
Good loot ... Yarn, camera, subsciption to Craft and Bust
Santaland Diaries on NPR-a favorite tradition
Merry Christmas!
Traditional chili dinner. 3 kinds. And prezzies
Peapod's doll bed arrived in the St Nick of time!
Paperwork at bank done. Still have to file police report.
Christmas Eve. Listening to lessons and carols on NPR. Since we won't get to mass tonight I'm glad to hear it.
Appears I'm the victim of credit card fraud. Bank caught it but not without a significant loss. Be spending part of tomorrow in paperwork
Btwn crowded store and traffic, feeling claustrophobic. Too dark to knit thru anxiety. At least baby not screaming.
Forgot how horribly crowded Central Mkt can be. Ugh.
Din @ Central Mkt. Then to gather the rest for Christmas cooking and a fruit we've never tried
